code: import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Purchase=function Purchase(){var listCart=useSelector(function(state){return state.itemReducer;});var quantity=0;var price=0;listCart.OnProcessing.forEach(function(element){quantity+=element.quantity===0?0:1;price+=element.cost*element.quantity;});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"cartPurchase",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["amount of product:",quantity]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:[" price :",price.toLocaleString("en-US",{style:"currency",currency:"USD"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"purchase"})]});};export default Purchase;
